overview: John C. Moran serves as President, Chief Executive Officer and Chairman of the Board at CE Ortho. Johnâ€™s experience includes 19 years in a variety of capacities with Synthes (USA), the leading manufacturer of orthopaedic implants used in fracture repair. His positions included Director of Finance, VP of Finance and Administration, VP of Product Development, and he was a founder and President of Synthes Spine Inc., taking it to well over $60M in sales. Since leaving Synthes in 1997, he has been an angel investor in a number of companies, mostly in the medical device field. He is on the board of Paradigm Spine, LLC, Ranier Technology and Anika Therapeutics. Previously, he was an early investor and board member of Spine Solutions (a prosthetic disc company sold to Synthes for $350M) and Power Medical Interventions, Inc.. John is a graduate of the University of Notre Dame and holds an MBA from Harvard University. John is a founding member of Core Essence Orthopaedics, Inc.
